# Process ignoring SIGTERM (bit 14 in mask = signal 15)
# SIGTERM ignored is high severity - process won't terminate gracefully
Name:	stubborn_daemon
State:	S (sleeping)
Tgid:	2000
Pid:	2000
PPid:	1
Uid:	1000	1000	1000	1000
Gid:	1000	1000	1000	1000
SigBlk:	0000000000000000
SigIgn:	0000000000004000
SigCgt:	0000000180000002
